name: Baby Wheels Pro
description:
NO ADVERTISEMENTS!!!

Baby Wheels is a fun endless game for kids. Avoid obstacles such us apples, balls, humps, candies, etc. It uses real physics engine.

How to play:
- Press the right arrow to rotate the wheels clockwise.
- Press the left arrow to rotate the wheels counter-clockwise.
- Collect as many baby bottles as you can.
- Avoid the baby head to hit the ground otherwise game over.

This game is created on BUILDBOX platform.

Enjoy the game!!!
